nneeww ccoolloorr uupp uunnddeerrnneeaatthh tthhee ccuurrrreenntt ccoolloorr ttoo aavvooiidd hhoolleess materials 600 yards fingering/sock weight yarn the shawl is easily adjustable i used the defiant color-way from june pryce fiber arts size 6 us needles tapestry needle for weaving in ends pins for blocking if desired without yarn-over s no dropped stitches b p b b p b b p b kfb 43 b p b b p b b p b kfb 41 b p b b p b b p b kfb 39 b p b b p b b p b kfb 37 b p b b p b b p kfb 35 b p b b p b kfb 33 b p b b p b kfb 31 b p b b p b kfb 29 b p b b p b kfb 27 b p b b p b kfb 25 b p b b p kfb 23 b p b kfb 21 b p b kfb 19 b p b kfb 17 b p b kfb 15 b p b kfb 13 b p kfb 11 kfb 9 kfb 7 kfb 5 kfb 3 kfb 1 kfb = knit into front and back of indicated stitch b = knit into back loop p = purl pink squares are worked in garter stitch blue squares show bead placement yellow indicates repeat for edges the repeat is six row tall with repeats of k3 b p b between to garter stitch edge it will make more sense while being knit pattern cast on 4 stitches row 1 kfb k3 row 2 and all even row k3 purl to end row 3 kfb k4 row 5 kfb k5 row 7 kfb k6 row 9 kfb k7 row 11 kfb p1 b k6 row 13 kfb b p1 b k6 row 15 kfb k1
